text: Hargicourt is a former commune. It is found in the region Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in the north of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Trois-Rivières.Arrêté préfectoral 12 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Somme
title: Hargicourt, Somme
